content:
We are designing an application that will receive data from telemedicine equipment that will function as a diagnostic center within ambulances.

The goal is for the hospital to receive the measured data and exams (ECG) if the doctor opts for this. This service is being performed inside an ambulance.

I need to send this data and images remotely to the consumer (hospital, clinic, etc ...)

I think about using NATS. (https://nats.io/about/)

Has any colleague ever had any contact, study or experience with NATS?

Is it possible that the json to be generated is FHIR compliant?

Every help is welcome!
